oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and single crystal X-ray structure of the first cationic Pd(II) complex of a tellurium-containing polyaza macrocycle: contrasting reactions of Pd(II) and Pt(II) with a 22-membered macrocyclic Schiff base
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MENON, SC
PANDA, A
SINGH, HB
BUTCHER, RJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: selenium coronands
donor atoms
palladium(ii)
reactivity
chemistry
2-(2'-pyridyl)phenyl(para-ethoxyphenyl)tellurium(ii)
behavior
nitrogen
m=pd
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reaction of the tellurium containing macrocyclic Schiff base 1 with Pd(PhCN)(2)Cl-2 and NH4PF6 gives the expected cationic complex [Pd(II)1][PF6](2); by contrast the reaction of 1 with Pt(cod)Cl-2 proceeds via novel transmetallation to yield an organoplatinum complex.
